name: Sleigh All Day Gift Set
about: What it is:A complete skincare routine set to help moisturize and smooth skin with up to 24-hour hydration, perfect for snowy winter days..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Squalane: Replenishes the skinu2019s barrier to keep it feeling soft, supple, and moisturized..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens..What Else You Need to Know:Kiehl's Since 1851u2019s Sleigh All Day Gift Set features Ultra Facial Cream, Ultra Facial Cleanser, Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Mask with 10.5% Squalane, and Creamy Eye Treatment with Avocado. It offers a complete skincare routine suitable for all skin types that promotes hydration, smoothness, and radiance..This Set Contains:- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Ultra Facial Cream
ingredients: -Squalane: Replenishes the skinu2019s barrier to keep it feeling soft, supple, and moisturized..-Apricot Kernel Oil: Moisturizes and softens skin while helping retain clarity and suppleness..-Glacial Glycoprotein: Hydrates and maintains skinu2019s moisture balance...Ultra Facial Cream:.Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Squalane, Bis-Peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Sucrose Stearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Peg-8 Stearate, Myristyl Myristate, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil/Apricot Kernel Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Persea Gratissima Oil/Avocado Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Oryza Sativa Bran Oil/Rice Bran Oil, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil/Olive Fruit Oil, Chlorphenesin, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Carbomer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil/Sweet Almond Oil, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja Oil/Soybean Oil, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Myristic Acid, Hydroxypalmitoyl Sphinganine, Salicylic Acid, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil/Sunflower Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract/Rosemary Leaf Extract, Citric Acid (F.I.L. Z293407/1).. .Ultra Facial Cleanser:.Aqua/Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Acrylates Copolymer, Lauryl Glucoside, Peg-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Triethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Hexylene Glycol, Behenyl Alcohol, Distearyl Ether, Sodium Benzoate, Laureth-2, Squalane, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil/Sweet Almond Oil, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil/Apricot Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Persea Gratissima Oil/Avocado Oil (F.I.L. D247772/1).. .Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Mask with 10.5% Squalane:.Aqua/Water, Lauryl Laurate, Squalane, Isononyl Isononanoate, Behenyl Behenate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sorbitan Stearate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Candelilla Cera/Candelilla Wax, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide (F.I.L. D273730/1).. .Creamy Eye Treatment with Avocado:.Aqua/Water, Squalane, Persea Gratissima Oil/Avocado Oil, Glycerin, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Sodium Chloride, Glycine Soja Oil/Soybean Oil, Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Carnauba Wax, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil/Sunflower Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract/Rosemary Leaf Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter/Shea Butter, Caffeine, Sodium Pca, Copper Gluconate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Salicylic Acid, Ci 40800/Beta-Carotene, Ci 77288/Chromium Oxide Greens (F.I.L. Z70013598/1).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Ultra Facial Cleanser:.-Apply a small amount to fingertips and massage into damp skin using upward, circular motions..-Avoid the eye area..-Rinse thoroughly or remove excess with a damp cloth...Creamy Eye Treatment with Avocado:.-Scoop a rice-grain-size amount of the formula onto your ring finger..-Rub it between your fingers to feel the hydration burst..-Gently tap around your delicate eye area until it's completely absorbed..-Avoid pulling the skin. .-Can be applied day or night...Ultra Facial Cream:.-Apply a dime-size amount of face cream to cleansed skin...Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Mask:.-For a gentle, hydrating cleanse, use fingertips to massage a small amount into dry skin and then wipe off with a dry face cloth..-If you need a more intense, nourishing cleanse, leave on for 90 seconds before removing..-For more intense hydration on dry areas needing extra care, apply a visible layer of formula to skin and leave on for 15 minutes..-Tissue off any remaining formula.
